014package org.microbean.producer;
015
016import java.util.function.BiFunction;
017
018import org.microbean.bean.Aggregate;
019import org.microbean.bean.Assignment;
020import org.microbean.bean.Request;
021
022/**
023 * An interface whose implementations install <dfn>around-invoke</dfn> interceptions.
024 *
025 * @param <I> the type of contextual instance
026 *
027 * <p>{@link InterceptionsApplicator} implementations are typically used to implement the {@link
028 * org.microbean.bean.Factory#create(Request)} method, together with {@link PostInitializer}s, {@link Initializer}s and
029 * {@link Producer}s.</p>
030 *
031 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
032 *
033 * @see #apply(Object, Request)
034 *
035 * @see PostInitializer
036 *
037 * @see Initializer
038 *
039 * @see Producer
040 */
041// Subordinate to Factory<I>. Normally applied to PostInitializer<I> output.
042// An applicator of business method interceptions. This is used during assembly of a Factory implementation and should
043// be used probably only when "around-invoke" interceptions are in effect.
044// Deliberately NOT an Aggregate as any dependencies this might have are not assignable to fields or methods.
045@FunctionalInterface
046public interface InterceptionsApplicator<I> extends BiFunction<I, Request<I>, I> {
047
048  /**
049   * Installs <dfn>around-invoke</dfn> method interceptions on the supplied contextual instance, which is presumed to
050   * have been {@linkplain PostInitializer fully initialized}, and returns the result.
051   *
052   * @param uninterceptedInstance a fully initialized contextual instance that needs to have certain of its methods
053   * intercepted; must not be {@code null}
054   *
055   * @param r a {@link Request} which may be used to acquire supporting contextual references; must not be {@code null}
056   *
057   * @return the supplied contextual instance, a copy of it, or a proxy wrapping it; never {@code null}
058   *
059   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
060   */
061  @Override // BiFunction<I, Request<I>, I>
062  public I apply(final I uninterceptedInstance, final Request<I> r);
063
064}
